Options used to compile Assimp :

```cmake
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_IMPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT FALSE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ALL_EXPORTERS_BY_DEFAULT FALSE)

SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_COLLADA_IMPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_OBJ_IMPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_BLEND_IMPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_FBX_IMPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_GLTF_IMPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_STL_IMPORTER TRUE)

SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSBIN_EXPORTER TRUE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSXML_EXPORTER TRUE)

SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_VIEW FALSE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_FRAMEWORK FALSE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_ASSIMP_TOOLS FALSE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_SAMPLES FALSE)
SET(ASSIMP_BUILD_TESTS FALSE)

SET(BUILD_SHARED_LIBS TRUE)
```
